page.title: 14RELIGIONS-SIKH
page.content: My church is called a{Gurdwara. } This is the name for a Sikh temple. I go there twice a month. I like going to my temple because in the main room where we pray there are decorations hanging from the ceiling. Also in the main room after the prayers have finished you can sometimes get free sweets. Some of the children can play outside. Up stairs they teach you how to speak,read and write Indian. The children can also play in the dinner hall. In the dinner room you can get free food and anyone can help serve the dinner.
